abstract: Critics from The New York Times will be squashed into many of the clubs during the CMJ Music Marathon alongside other music fans and chroniclers. But we can't be everywhere. This year, we invite readers to join us in appraising certain CMJ shows on Twitter.

headline.main: CMJ Music Marathon Requires Critical Reinforcements
